title: 2x2 Townhomes Fully Renovated Unit with Attached Garage
posting_body: Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1034 Sq.
Located in the South Green Valley neighborhood of Henderson, Nevada, Parkway Townhomes offers two and three bedroom apartment homes.
Each home includes an attached garage, full-size washer and dryer, and hardwood-style flooring.
Select units are newly renovated, featuring granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances and custom cabinetry.
Parkway Townhomes offers an exclusive style of neighborhood living.
In the center of our private community, you will find a resort-style swimming pool with lounge areas, a gas BBQ and ample seating.
Residents have 24 hour access to our fitness center, dog park and Pittman Wash Trail located at the south gate of the community.
Zoned for Clark County School District, you can enjoy the convenience of having Aggie Roberts Elementary School just across the street.

Parkway Townhomes is also located just minutes from The District at Green Valley Ranch, McCarran Airport, and Town Square, I-215 and U.S. Route 95.Parkway Townhomes- relaxed, suburban apartment living that we know as the real Las Vegas experience.
Dogs and domestic cats are allowed, pending approval by management, not aggressive breeds.
Dogs must not act aggressive at any time or bark excessively.
Dogs must be "apartment friendly" a maximum of two pets is allowed per apartment.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
